name: Legalize! Privacy Policy and Terms of Service
author: kisded

sections.description: Legalize! - Makes life easier by automatically generating mandatory 'Privacy Policy' and 'Terms of Service' pages for your website!
sections.changelog:
Version 1.0 Release Date 2016-10-30
  • First version released!

Version 1.1 Release Date 2016-11-20

  • Fixed some minor issues
